channel.title: J Balvin on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in J Balvin on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: 2025 VMAs: Sabrina Carpenter Among First Group of Performers (Exclusive)
item.description: Sombr, Alex Warren and J Balvin featuring DJ Snake will also take the stage at New York’s UBS Arena for the annual music event, airing live for the first time on CBS as well as longtime home MTV.

item.title: John Early’s ‘Maddie’s Secret,’ Nadia Latif’s ‘The Man in My Basement’ Join Toronto Film Fest Lineup
item.description: TIFF’s Discovery sidebar for first-time and emerging directors also includes world premieres of films by Eva Thomas with ‘Nika & Madison,’ Cato Kusters, Kunsang Kyirong and Zamo Mkhwanazi.
